article.title: What's in my closet?: Image classification using fuzzy logic

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following is NOT an application of fuzzy logic mentioned in the article?
What does a membership function in fuzzy logic describe?
choices: The probability of an element belonging to a set.
The exact location of an element within a set.
The degree to which an element belongs to a set.
The binary classification of an element as either belonging or not belonging to a set.

multiple_choice_question.text: What image processing technique is used in the article to identify the edges of clothing items?
What is the purpose of using Regions of Interest (ROIs) in the article\'s image processing?
choices: To reduce image size and save storage space.
To focus on specific features and improve detection precision.
To apply different filters to different parts of the image.
To convert the image to grayscale.
